name: pocket-dimension
description: A tiny place to store tiny things.

scripts.publish:layer: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name PocketDimensionLayer --description "Common helpers for Pocket Dimension" --license-info 'MIT' --zip-file fileb://${PWD}/build/layer.zip --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x
scripts.deploy:layer: npm run build:layer && npm run publish:layer

author: Tim Douglas
